DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develop new treatment hopefully result relief symptom prolongation life . For reason , doctor offer treatment new experimental drug call PS 341 .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study Therapy With PS 341 Patients With Advanced Stage Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients must confirm NSCLC ( squamous , adeno large cell anaplastic carcinoma ) stage III B Stage IV . No prior chemotherapy regimen Patients must adequate organ marrow function Untreated symptomatic brain metastasis Patients know HIV positivity
